question.text: Louise Joy Brown is an English woman who was the first test-tube baby. She was born by a process in which

options.text: Fertilization is external and foetus formation is internal
Fertilization is internal and foetus formation is external
Both fertilization and foetus formation are internal
Both fertilization and foetus formation are external

solution.text: Fertilization is the fusion of the ovum and the sperm. In cases of infertility assisted reproductive technologies (ART) are resorted to reproduction. One of the methods of ART is IVF (In-vitro fertilization) and Embryonic transfer (ET) commonly known as the test-tube baby method. The ovum from the wife/donor and sperm from the husband/donor are fertilized outside the body to form zygote under similar conditions. The zygote is later transferred into the uterus for further development of the embryo into a foetus.
